text: Rero kubera impamvu z’Impuhwe zizoba zivuye ku Mana yawe ubaye umuntu woroshe kuribo, mugabo iyo uba umuntu ufise umukazo n’umutima ukomeye abantu bose bari kuguhunga, rero n’ubagirire ikigongwe, kandi ubasabire	ikigongwe,	kandi	mwumvikane	nabo	mu	bintu	vyose,	kandi niwagira icipfuzo icarico cose niwizere Imana yawe gusa, mu vy’ukuri Imana ikunda cane abayizera
